title: Spatio-temporal characterization of earthquake sequence ...
summary: This article uses point process modeling, specifically the Hawkes process (a self-excited point process model), to understand earthquake sequences in space-time. It considers spatial, temporal, and covariate effects, which are relevant to contextual data.
usefulness_reason: Score 95 assigned because the article directly discusses "Point process modeling" and "self-excited point process model" (Hawkes process) in the context of "space-time" for earthquake sequences, which is highly relevant to "Spatio Temporal Point Process". It also mentions "covariate effects" which can be related to contextual data.
